name: Cookie Jelly: Sweet Mania
description:
Cookie Jelly: Sweet Mania will bring you a lot of new experiences within the familiar gameplay of the match-3 type.
Enjoy the sweet candy world with lots of candies, puddings, jellies, cupcakes, cookies and desserts with fun and stylish challenges; the game will bring you lots and lots of entertainment.
This is a very sweet and addictive match three game!
Connect two or more jelly to crush and splash, and try to get as many score as possible!
Enjoy this blast mania game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
Cookie Jelly: Sweet Mania features:
- Exploring challenge maps with more than 100 levels
- Fun matching mechanic brings balance to the gameplay
- Easy to pick up, hard to master. Itís not easy to get all 3 stars for each and every levels
- Lively sound effects with full HD graphics and cute characters
- Easy to learn but hard to game master.
- Fantastic and cute UI & cool animation effects.
- Very small size but super tasty graphics
- Create a high score in your friends circle

How to play Cookie Jelly: Sweet Mania :
- Connect two or more same sweet jelly.
- Achieve the target score to jump the game level.
- Eliminate the more candies in one line can get more extra scores.

Thank for play Cookie Jelly: Sweet Mania
